TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class BluetoothGatt : Java.Lang.Object, Android.Bluetooth.IBluetoothProfile, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BluetoothGatt extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Bluetooth.IBluetoothProfile, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Public API for the Bluetooth GATT Profile.

remarks.para: Public API for the Bluetooth GATT Profile.
This class provides Bluetooth GATT functionality to enable communication with Bluetooth Smart or Smart Ready devices.
To connect to a remote peripheral device, create a and call to get a instance of this class. GATT capable devices can be discovered using the Bluetooth device discovery or BLE scan process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AbortReliableWrite() cil managed

Docs.summary: Cancels a reliable write transaction for a given device.

remarks.para: Cancels a reliable write transaction for a given device.
Calling this function will discard all queued characteristic write operations for a given remote device.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AbortReliableWrite(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice mDevice) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance bool BeginReliableWrite() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initiates a reliable write transaction for a given remote device.

remarks.para: Initiates a reliable write transaction for a given remote device.

Once a reliable write transaction has been initiated, all calls to are sent to the remote device for verification and queued up for atomic execution. The application will receive an callback in response to every call and is responsible for verifying if the value has been transmitted accurately.

After all characteristics have been queued up and verified, will execute all writes. If a characteristic was not written correctly, calling will cancel the current transaction without commiting any values on the remote device.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

Docs.summary: Close this Bluetooth GATT client.

remarks.para:
Close this Bluetooth GATT client.
Application should call this method as early as possible after it is done with this GATT client.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Connect() cil managed

Docs.summary: Connect back to remote device.

remarks.para: Connect back to remote device.
This method is used to re-connect to a remote device after the connection has been dropped. If the device is not in range, the re-connection will be triggered once the device is back in range.

Docs.summary: Not supported - please use with as argument

remarks.para: Not supported - please use with as argument

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Bluetooth.GattConnectionPriority ConnectionPriorityBalanced = (0)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Bluetooth.GattConnectionPriority enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Connection paramter update - Use the connection paramters recommended by the Bluetooth SIG.

remarks.para: Connection paramter update - Use the connection paramters recommended by the Bluetooth SIG. This is the default value if no connection parameter update is requested.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Bluetooth.GattConnectionPriority ConnectionPriorityHigh = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Bluetooth.GattConnectionPriority enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Connection paramter update - Request a high priority, low latency connection.

remarks.para: Connection paramter update - Request a high priority, low latency connection. An application should only request high priority connection paramters to transfer large amounts of data over LE quickly. Once the transfer is complete, the application should request connectoin parameters to reduce energy use.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Bluetooth.GattConnectionPriority ConnectionPriorityLowPower = (2)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Bluetooth.GattConnectionPriority enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: Connection paramter update - Request low power, reduced data rate connection parameters.

remarks.para: Connection paramter update - Request low power, reduced data rate connection parameters.

Docs.summary: Return the remote bluetooth device this GATT client targets to

remarks.para: Return the remote bluetooth device this GATT client targets to

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Disconnect() cil managed

Docs.summary: Disconnects an established connection, or cancels a connection attempt currently in progress.

remarks.para: Disconnects an established connection, or cancels a connection attempt currently in progress.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool DiscoverServices() cil managed

Docs.summary: Discovers services offered by a remote device as well as their characteristics and descriptors.

remarks.para: Discovers services offered by a remote device as well as their characteristics and descriptors.
This is an asynchronous operation. Once service discovery is completed, the callback is triggered. If the discovery was successful, the remote services can be retrieved using the function.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ExecuteReliableWrite() cil managed

Docs.summary: Executes a reliable write transaction for a given remote device.

remarks.para: Executes a reliable write transaction for a given remote device.
This function will commit all queued up characteristic write operations for a given remote device.
A callback is invoked to indicate whether the transaction has been executed correctly.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothGattService GetService(class Java.Util.UUID uuid) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a , if the requested UUID is supported by the remote device.

remarks.para: Returns a , if the requested UUID is supported by the remote device.
This function requires that service discovery has been completed for the given device.
If multiple instances of the same service (as identified by UUID) exist, the first instance of the service is returned.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ReadCharacteristic(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) cil managed

Docs.param: Characteristic to read from the remote device
Docs.summary: Reads the requested characteristic from the associated remote device.

remarks.para: Reads the requested characteristic from the associated remote device.
This is an asynchronous operation. The result of the read operation is reported by the callback.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ReadDescriptor(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothGattDescriptor descriptor) cil managed

Docs.param: Descriptor value to read from the remote device
Docs.summary: Reads the value for a given descriptor from the associated remote device.

remarks.para: Reads the value for a given descriptor from the associated remote device.
Once the read operation has been completed, the callback is triggered, signaling the result of the operation.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ReadRemoteRssi() cil managed

Docs.summary: Read the RSSI for a connected remote device.

remarks.para: Read the RSSI for a connected remote device.
The callback will be invoked when the RSSI value has been read.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RequestConnectionPriority(valuetype Android.Bluetooth.GattConnectionPriority connectionPriority) cil managed

Docs.param:
Request a specific connection priority. Must be one of ,
or .
Docs.summary: Request a connection parameter update.

remarks.para: Request a connection parameter update.
This function will send a connection parameter update request to the remote device.

Docs.exception: If the parameters are outside of their specified range.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RequestMtu(int32 mtu) cil managed

Docs.summary: Request an MTU size used for a given connection.

remarks.para: Request an MTU size used for a given connection.

When performing a write request operation (write without response), the data sent is truncated to the MTU size. This function may be used to request a larger MTU size to be able to send more data at once.
A callback will indicate whether this operation was successful.
Requires permission.

Docs.summary: Returns a list of GATT services offered by the remote device.

remarks.para: Returns a list of GATT services offered by the remote device.
This function requires that service discovery has been completed for the given device.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SetCharacteristicNotification (Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic, bool enable);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SetCharacteristicNotification(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic, bool enable) cil managed

Docs.param: The characteristic for which to enable notifications
Set to true to enable notifications/indications
Docs.summary: Enable or disable notifications/indications for a given characteristic.

remarks.para: Enable or disable notifications/indications for a given characteristic.
Once notifications are enabled for a characteristic, a callback will be triggered if the remote device indicates that the given characteristic has changed.
Requires permission.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool WriteCharacteristic(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) cil managed

Docs.param: Characteristic to write on the remote device
Docs.summary: Writes a given characteristic and its values to the associated remote device.

remarks.para: Writes a given characteristic and its values to the associated remote device.
Once the write operation has been completed, the callback is invoked, reporting the result of the operation.
Requires permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool WriteDescriptor(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothGattDescriptor descriptor) cil managed

Docs.param: Descriptor to write to the associated remote device
Docs.summary: Write the value of a given descriptor to the associated remote device.

remarks.para: Write the value of a given descriptor to the associated remote device.
A callback is triggered to report the result of the write operation.
Requires permission.
